title: H is for Hawk - method of development

content.question: How does the rest of the passage address the “seconds” mentioned in paragraph 1, sentence 11 ?

choices.label: It recounts events immediately leading up to the seconds in greater detail.
It explains how the author copes with what occurs during the seconds and explores why she does so.
It examines different ways to address the consequences of the seconds and considers their relative success.
It suggests that the seconds were much less dramatic than they initially seemed.

content.answer: It explains how the author copes with what occurs during the seconds and explores why she does so.

skill.text: Skill 5.C: Recognize and explain the use of methods of development to accomplish a purpose.
